channel.title: OpenFoundry - Recently Added Listings - Real World

item.title: Amazon Mechanical Turk
item.description:
The Amazon Mechanical Turk (MTurk) is one of the suites of Amazon Web Services, a crowdsourcing marketplace that enables computer programs to co-ordinate the use of human intelligence to perform tasks which computers are unable to do.

Reference: https://www.mturk.com/mturk/welcome
item.author: dio
